function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on natural ventilation may lead to inadequate air exchange, allowing viruses and particles to accumulate indoors.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission and poor indoor air quality.","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance of natural ventilation openings, use of air purifiers, and installation of monitoring systems for air quality.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, air quality monitoring systems.","People":"Building occupants, especially in densely populated areas or shared workspaces.","Owner":"Building managers, property owners."},{"Description":"High humidity levels in rooms may promote the growth of mold and mildew, leading to respiratory health issues.","Impact":"Potential respiratory problems and worsening indoor air quality.","Mitigation":"Use of dehumidifiers, proper insulation and ventilation, regular cleaning and maintenance of ventilation systems.","Technologies":"Dehumidifiers, ventilation systems.","People":"Building occupants, especially those with respiratory conditions.","Owner":"Building managers, property owners."},{"Description":"Inadequate airflow variability in the building may result in stagnant air and concentration of pollutants.","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission and poor indoor air quality.","Mitigation":"Use of mechanical ventilation systems, installation of air circulation fans, and regular indoor air quality assessments.","Technologies":"Mechanical ventilation systems, air circulation fans.","People":"Building occupants, especially in poorly ventilated areas.","Owner":"Building managers, property developers."}]}
